author: reto
msg: enhanced permissionparser no longer to rely on osgi class to be able to parse the toString version of permission besides the osgi style with quotes around arguments

author: cos
msg: HADOOP-6860. 'compile-fault-inject' should never be called directly. Contributed by Konstantin Boudnik.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r922926, fix an accidental lock release in the lock acquire
code. This fixes the externals tests failures on ra_serf/ra_neon.
(svn_wc__acquire_write_lock): When failing to acquire a lock, don't try
to release obtained locks on non-directories, as that will just release

author: kelly
msg: 3. In "webapp/filemgr": add std ignores; replace Caltech notices with ASF notices; add missing XML PI decls; replace gov.nasa.jpl with org.apache in parameter names & imports; adjust dependencies and use relative path to oodt-core.
